TopicTitle: BACK ON THIS after my account was deleted in the great deletion

Articles.Content:
Hallo.

I will be streaming, so follow me at http://www.twitch.tv/haha_same_yolo if you're up for watching when I'm playing KSP!

I promise rude language, rude references, and rude dude Kerman Kerbals.

It'll be great.
Glad to see you back from that apocalypse! Good luck on your streaming! Do not be afraid to post questions or suggestions in their correct forum locations. Have fun and enjoy sir!

Welcome back to the forums!

As austin has noted, most people around here don't mind answering any questions you may have about playing the game. I'd also recommend that you check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig) if you ever get stuck anywhere in the game.

Happy landings!
